research_insight_text_link.research_insight_description: Amber Agriculture is focused on enhancing grain management and marketing for farmers through the development of a system for monitoring storage conditions in particulate goods. This system employs wireless sensor nodes with environmental sensors to collect data on the condition of bulk goods like grain. The analysis of this data aids in maintaining optimal storage conditions, ensuring quality and reducing waste.

overview_description.description: Amber Agriculture was built by founders with a Farm + Fitbit background.  The firm is on the leading edge of automation technology development in agriculture.  It's first product is an IoT self-install kit for farmers to automate one high-return process at the farm level.

properties.growth_insight_description: Amber Agriculture may be growing as evidenced by the adoption of their CO2 sensor in a significant storage capacity, indicating an expansion in their product usage. The integration of their technology into a 180,000 unit capacity suggests that their market penetration is increasing. This adoption of Amber Agriculture's sensor technology reflects a positive response from the agriculture industry, which could be indicative of a broader trend in customer acceptance and potentially increased revenue.

about_short_description.short_description: Amber Agriculture leverages the latest in analytics and automation to help farmers manage and market grain.

product.name: ACE AIR Kit
product.description: A self-install kit that enables wireless grain bin management, including CO2 analysis and fan control, without the need for cables.

product.name: ANALYZER
product.description: A device that provides early alerts when grain conditions deviate from specified parameters.

product.name: AUTOMATOR
product.description: A system that optimizes fan operation by controlling air flow based on environmental conditions.

product.name: CONNECTIVITY
product.description: Built-in connectivity that eliminates the need for setting up separate internet, WiFi, or hotspots for grain bin management.
